ygData.subject: Re: Survey and Females
ygData.msgSnippet: It may backfire Talies, there are people who think that a incredibly sexy wood elf female (mainly the blond one for some reason) plays the wood elf bard that
ygData.messageBody:
It may backfire Talies, there are people who think that a incredibly sexy
wood elf female (mainly the blond one for some reason) plays the wood elf
bard that you see in game. IT is also entirely possible that there are
people who think that the troll female is played by a incredibly sexy wood
elf female =). In that case he may like the troll come on =).

Treilanin Loreweaver
Honour Guard, Karana

On Thu, 7 Oct 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> At 03:52 PM 10/7/99 -0600, you wrote:
> >From: "Frank Hartmann" <FRANHART@...>
> >
> >Here's an idea:
> >
> >When being stalked by an unscrupulous 16 year old, get the stalker's name
> >and log out. Now log back in using your ogre female. Find the stalker and
> >turn the tables on them, i.e. follow them around, make suggestive
> >statements, etc. This will surely frighten them off and give them an idea of
> >how their actions affect others. Don't push it too far, i.e. harassment,
> >just enough to make your point. You might even role play it a bit to make it
> >fun.
>
> Heh - "Bhuku think you cute. Bhuku want hug you and squeeze you - bet you
> feel good under armor... Take armor off - let Bhuku see."
>
> Talies
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.
>
